creator: jefft@apache.org
text:
As discussed at:

http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-dev&m=103864320301912&w=2

This patch allows a <catalogpath> inside <xmlcatalog>, and updates the docs and
testcases. <catalogpath> subsumes the functionality of the existing
<catalogfiles>, which is marked as deprecated in the docs.


--Jeff
